name: org
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used at the end of internet addresses to show that the address belongs to a group or company that is not established to make a profit: dictionaries@cup.org
short for organization: In big orgs teams possibly use cloud apps when working across divisions. It's the network structures that make an org work, and not the established hierarchy.

abbreviation for organization: used to show that an internet address belongs to an organization whose main purpose is not that it should produce a profit: You can search Cambridge dictionaries online at www.dictionary.cambridge.org.
